download_blocked_message_title.description: The title of the message shown to the user when a download is blocked

download_notify_message_title.description: The title of the message shown to the user when a download is detected

download_blocked_message_body.message: Download of $filename$ from $url$ has been blocked. Download URL: $fileUrl$
download_blocked_message_body.description: The body of the message shown to the user when a download is blocked

download_notify_message_body.message: Download of $filename$ from $url$ has been detected. Download URL: $fileUrl$
download_notify_message_body.description: The body of the message shown to the user when a download is detected

config_error_title.description: The title of the message shown to the user when a managed config fails to parse

config_error_body.message: There was an error parsing the managed config, using default
config_error_body.description: The body of the message shown to the user when a managed config fails to parse
